channel.title: Lambda Library
channel.description: A collection of functional code snippets and solution to challenges in Haskell and Clojure

item.title: AOC2021 Day 1 - Haskell
item.description: I decided to use AOC2021 to start learning some Haskell. The hardest part for me was figuring out how to do proper IO, as it is contagious, but if you've ever been a Haskell beginner, then I'm not telling any news.The problem
